title-group.article-title: On the Probability Distribution of Condition Numbers of Complete Intersection Varieties and the Average Radius of Convergence of Newton's Method in the Underdetermined Case

abstract.p: In these pages we show upper bound estimates on the probability distribution of the condition numbers of smooth complete intersection algebraic varieties. As a by-product, we also obtain lower bounds for the average value of the radius of Newton's basin of attraction in the case of positive dimension affine complex algebraic varieties.
